i have a comment bout {{champion:64}} he should be immune to blinds because he is already blind :D
And {{champion:37}} should be immune to silences :D

Except she's not talking, you would be silencing her harp.

So Sona is the champion against whom the "Silence" CC is most accurate.

Using that logic, you could say that Lee Sin has an impromptu way of seeing via his other senses, just as Sona has an impromptu way of speaking via musical instruments.  If that were the case, Lee Sin should actually be stunned when he gets silenced.
